name: An alien game
description:
This game is the result of a 72 hours jam with 1 Dev/Game Designer and 1 Artist/Animator... and... a lot of water ! 

Your mission, escape the ship and avoid being eaten alive by aliens. 

This game controls with WASD and 2 buttons of the mouse (no controller compatibility). Equip in one hand, dropped weapons by clicking left or right mouse button ! Have fun !
